ingredients.item: 2 x 200g cans essential Waitrose Tuna Steak in Spring Water, drained
50g essential Waitrose Medium Cheddar Cheese, grated

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 8 minutes, drain.  Heat the cheese sauce in the same pan with the sweetcorn, peas, tuna and tomato purée. Stir in the pasta, season and transfer to an ovenproof dish.  4. Sprinkle with cheese and place under a grill for 3 minutes until golden.
